text:
e="preserve">Neil Brannon (October 29, 1940 – September 22, 2020) was an American politician. He was in the Oklahoma House of Representatives from the 3rd district from 2002 to 2010. He was a member of the Democratic Party. Brannon was born in Muse, Oklahoma.
Brannon died of a heart attack on September 22, 2020, in Fort Smith, Arkansas at age 79.
